original_text: And Solomon answered all her questions. There was nothing hidden from Solomon that he could not explain to her.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그가 묻는 말에 다 대답하였으니 솔로몬이 몰라서 대답하지 못한 것이 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And Solomon answered all her questions.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 솔로몬은 그녀의 모든 질문에 대답했습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was nothing hidden from Solomon
that he could not explain to her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀에게 설명할 수 없었던 것.
